text: 🚨🇸🇾 Privatization of public hospitals, Syria’s health sector in intensive care! 💉😱 Enab Baladi – Jana al-Issa The Syrian regime plans to open the door for investment in the health sector! 💰👀 But what does this mean for the people? 🤔The Minister of Health, Hassan al-Ghabbash, claims it’s to improve health services and reduce costs! 🏥💸 But isn’t that just a fancy way of saying they can’t afford to provide proper healthcare anymore? 😡And let’s not forget, this comes after years of devastating war and destruction! 🌪️💔 The health sector is already in shambles! 🤯 How can privatization possibly help? 😳I fear for the future of Syria’s healthcare system! 😟 Will the vulnerable be left behind? 🤷‍♂️ Can we truly trust private companies to prioritize people over profit? 💸👀
